=== System Distribution October 16, 2007 (8.0.1016) ===

Major Changes:
  * New sensors (PMD, FindBugs, Checkstyle).
  * Improvements to SDV and SDB (internal performance stuff)
  * Misc internal improvements to Utilities, SensorBase.
